name: Sacrifice of the Beloved
storyline:
The game follows the story of a man trying to find the source of his nightmares but instead uncovers the mystery of the Patrick Family.
The story shows the pain of a father who blamed himself for what happened to his family, the guilt of a mother who lost everything trying to save it
and anger of a child who saw her beloved die in front of her eyes
summary:
ABOUT THE GAME:
Sacrifice Of The Beloved (SOB) is a game horro/puzzle developed by one person(16Y) in the course of 3 months.

ABOUT PUZZLES IN THE GAME:
Some of the puzzles are story based so one has to pay attention to the story to solve them easily.

PLAYTIME: 30-40 MINS
NOTE: IT'S A WEIRD GAME BY A WEIRD PERSON :|
